remarks: The function ` F ` from ~ snmlval is a mapping from positive integers to real numbers in the range ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
statement:
snmlff.f $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( # ` { k e. ( 1 ... n ) | ( |_ ` ( ( A x. ( R ^ k ) ) mod R ) ) = B } ) / n ) ) $.
snmlff $p |- F : NN --> ( 0 [,] 1 ) $.
$d A n $.
$d B n $.
$d R n $.
$d k n $.
